ComicInfo.Summary:
At last - AGNES, KANE, and MOON KNIGHT join CONAN in the Hyborian Age for the final showdown between SET, the WYRM, and...KHONSHU?!
JAMES ALLISON brought them together, but will KHONSHU tear them apart?
The thrilling conclusion to the ages-spanning saga that will have ramifications on the future of the assembled cast!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Carlos Pacheco, Aneke & Frank D'Armata | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Christian Ward | 2 | Var | Virgin Connecting Variant Cover | Giuseppe Camuncoli & Jean-Francois Beaulieu | 3 | Var | Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado | 4 | Note: Includes the final part of a Solomon Kane four part novella entitled "The Get of Garm" written by C.L. Werner.
